Package fr.umlv.splendor

Class ActionReader2

java.lang.Object
fr.umlv.splendor.ActionReader2
public class ActionReader2 extends Object
This object read the actions of the player and executes them.

      public int checkClic(fr.umlv.zen5.Event event, ArrayList<Rectangle2D> rectangles)
      Check if the click is contains in a list of rectangles.
      Parameters:
      event - (Event) the event produced by the click
      rectangles - (ArrayList) the list of rectangles
      Returns:
      (Integer) the positions of the rectangle in the list if the click is in it, -1 otherwise.
